description: Given an array nums, there is a sliding window of size k which is moving from the very left of the array to the very right. You can only see the k numbers in the window. Each time the sliding window moves right by one position. Return the max sliding window.

prompts.prompt: Implement the 'maxSlidingWindow' function that returns the maximum values of each window of size 'k' as it slides over a list of integers from left to right.

Write a function named 'maxSlidingWindow' that takes a list of integers 'nums' and an integer 'k'. The function should return a list containing the maximum values of each window of size 'k' as it slides over the given list of integers from left to right.
